participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Emily is cheerful and sociable, with a nurturing side that reflects her love for cooking and family.
participant_1.background: I am still in love with my ex boyfriend. I love to cook for my family and friends. I am a female and love to be surrounded by males. People say I have a cute laugh. I work in a publishing building.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is laid-back and approachable, enjoying casual conversations and pop culture, which makes him relatable.
participant_2.background: I love watching sitcoms on television. I listen to a Fall Out Boy record every day. I drive a Honda thatâ€™s seen better days. I'm looking forward to reading the latest political thriller. Sometimes, I sit by strangers on the subway and strike up a conversation.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1.
Hi! I'm participant_2.
What do you do for fun?
I love watching sitcoms on TV. I'm also a big fan of Fall Out Boy.
I love sitcoms too! My favorite is The Office.
The Office is great! I also love Parks and Recreation.
I love Parks and Rec too! What are some of your favorite Fall Out Boy songs?
I love all of their songs, but my favorites are "Sugar, We're Going Down," "Dance Dance," and "Thnks Fr Th Mmrs."
Those are all great songs! I love "Dance Dance" the best.
Me too! What do you do for work?
I'm a publisher.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a teacher.
That's great! I love teaching.
Me too! I love helping kids learn.
I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thank you! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot of interests in common with me.
Yeah, I think we do!
Maybe we can hang out sometime and watch a sitcom or listen to Fall Out Boy.
That would be fun!
Great! I'll text you my number.
Okay, sounds good.
